Review Text: It’s such a beautiful warm bronzer! Great for the summertime to get that golden goddess glow. I love the embossing and the packaging is very compacted. It’s lightweight and I can throw it into my bag to carry it with me.

reference_summary:
Trophy Wife Cosmetics Lipstick - Semi Matte - Natural, Vegan & Cruelty Free Anna
Trophy Wife
{'Brand': 'Trophy Wife', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Semi-Matte, Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine,Moisturizing,Clean,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '670924966586'}
I am in love with this lipstick! The packaging looks luxurious to me and really stands out from my collection. I went with this shade which is a bright red with orange tones. It just goes with everything I wear and surprisingly my hair color at the moment. I also like how versatile this is so I can dress up or down with this color. It is 100% vegan, made with plant based wax and other natural ingredients like candelilla wax, castor seed oil, shea butter, almond oil, grape seed oil, jojoba, and coconut oil. The lipstick feels very smooth when applying and it I didn’t need a liner. And I think I reapplied when I remembered to after 3 hours and held up fine without any chapping or colorless patches. This is cruelty-free too!
Favorite new lipstick
Catrice | SUNGASM Luminizing Bronzer 01 | For A Sun-Kissed Shimmery Finish | Highly Pigmented & Blendable | Vegan, Paraben Free, Oil Free | Cruelty Free
Catrice

It’s such a beautiful warm bronzer! Great for the summertime to get that golden goddess glow. I love the embossing and the packaging is very compacted. It’s lightweight and I can throw it into my bag to carry it with me.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys cosmetics, particularly lip products that are semi-matte and versatile in shade, as well as bronzers for a sun-kissed look.
- **Values:** Strongly favors vegan and cruelty-free products, emphasizing a commitment to ethical and clean beauty brands.
- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Appreciates luxurious packaging and vibrant colors, with a specific fondness for bright red shades with orange tones, and also values beautifully crafted bronzers.
- **Application Experience:** Prefers lipsticks that are smooth to apply and do not require additional products like lip liners. Values long-lasting wear, comfort, and moisturizing benefits in lip products, while appreciating bronzers that are highly pigmented and blendable.
- **Use Cases:** Looks for versatility in makeup that complements various outfits and occasions, suitable for both casual and formal settings, and seeks products that enhance her summer glow.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Demonstrates a high level of satisfaction with products aligning with her ethical and performance-related values, actively seeking items that deliver quality and aesthetic appeal.

The recent interaction reflects her continued trend toward conscious cosmetic choices, now expanding her interest to non-lip products, while maintaining her prioritization of quality, ethical standards, and luxurious aesthetics in her makeup collection.
